#ubuntu pl: try changing the server you are using in System > Administration > Software Sources
does it say which repository indexes?
and are you clicking on reload when you make the server change?
No it reloads automatically after the changes...\
you click on close button or the revert button?
No... can you solve it via terminal?
pastebin the error please, use paste.ubuntu.com
copy the error you are getting and paste it to paste.ubuntu.com then give me the address it shows you so I can look at it

an error occured, E: Could not get lock /var/lib/apt/lists/lock - open (11: Resource temporarily unavailable)
2010-05-21T18:23:00.000Z	IdleOne	sc	ok
2010-05-21T18:23:00.000Z	IdleOne	sc	do sudo rm -R /var/lib/apt/lists/lock
2010-05-21T18:24:00.000Z	IdleOne	sc	also make sure you don't have any other package management application open
2010-05-21T18:25:00.000Z	sc	IdleOne	Ok it works. thank you very much...
2010-05-21T18:25:00.000Z	IdleOne	sc	you are welcome
